languages.text: "Весьма... хладнокровно. Наверное, у тебя и правда железка вместо сердца".

traits.locale_text: "Весьма... хладнокровно. Наверное, у тебя и правда железка вместо сердца".

languages.text: "That was rather callous of you. I guess you really do have a heart of metal."
languages.original_text: "Весьма... хладнокровно. Наверное, у тебя и правда железка вместо сердца".

traits.locale_text: "That was rather callous of you. I guess you really do have a heart of metal."
"That was rather callous of you. I guess you really do have a heart of metal."

languages.text: “你的做法真够冷酷无情的，我猜你确实有颗铁石心肠。”
languages.original_text: "That was rather callous of you. I guess you really do have a heart of metal."

languages.text: «Cuánta frialdad demuestra. Desde luego, su corazón está hecho de metal».
languages.original_text: "That was rather callous of you. I guess you really do have a heart of metal."

traits.locale_text: «Cuánta frialdad demuestra. Desde luego, su corazón está hecho de metal».

languages.text: 「ずいぶんと無慈悲なことをしたものだ。お前の心はまさに金属でできているのだろうな」
languages.original_text: "That was rather callous of you. I guess you really do have a heart of metal."

traits.locale_text: 「ずいぶんと無慈悲なことをしたものだ。お前の心はまさに金属でできているのだろうな」

languages.text: "Das war ziemlich herzlos von Euch. Ihr scheint wirklich ein Herz aus Metall zu haben."
languages.original_text: "That was rather callous of you. I guess you really do have a heart of metal."

languages.text: « C'était particulièrement cruel de votre part. Il faut croire que vous avez vraiment un cœur d'acier. »
languages.original_text: "That was rather callous of you. I guess you really do have a heart of metal."

traits.locale_text: « Ainsi, vous avez trahi votre mentor ? »

languages.text: "Çok duygusuzsun. Gerçekten de metalden bir kalbin olsa gerek."
languages.original_text: "That was rather callous of you. I guess you really do have a heart of metal."

traits.locale_text: "Çok duygusuzsun. Gerçekten de metalden bir kalbin olsa gerek."
